short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easy way to set default query params

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing the Chrome Dev Tools extension for easy default query parameter management! 

With this extension, you can seamlessly add or delete multiple resources (URLs) and parameter-value pairs for each resource right from your browser's developer tools.

Key features include:

- Resource Management: Easily add or remove multiple URLs along with their corresponding query parameters.

- Parameter Control: Fine-tune your queries with precision by toggling parameters on or off for each resource.

- Exact Path Configuration: Choose whether parameters should be added to the exact path or to child paths, giving you flexibility in how your queries are structured.

- Overwrite Option: Decide whether existing parameters should be overwritten when adding new ones, ensuring full control over your query configurations.

With this extension, optimising and managing query parameters for your web projects has never been easier. Experience seamless control and enhanced efficiency in your development workflow today!
